name: Core API Release 36.11.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs, which brings you a new features. Please see below for details.

ADDED.text: Introducing a new feature Restrict Login Sharing that gives the capability to limit the number of active sessions per user account. All LoginRadius APIs that return user profiles will now include the SessionsLimit attribute when the feature is enabled.
Introducing new error codes 1327,1328 and APIs that support the Passkey feature have been added under the Multifactor Authentication Section.
